pages.text: The Friendly Fire Flower redirects damage you deal to yourself to your mana reserves before harming you, at a default cost of 5 mana per 1 damage. If you are a Solarborn, mana bleed lasts half as long with this equipped. This item also partially protects against fire damage.$(br2)Item idea originally by Z-Tunic
$(o)Any similarities to other games are purely coincidental.
